description: Do not drink in public places.
Do not engage in public displays of affection.
Do not publicly engage in offensive language or hand gestures.
During Ramadan, do not eat or drink in public until iftar time.
Do not photograph local people without their consent.
Do not photograph airports, bridges, government buildings and palaces.
Do not make defamatory or offensive comments about UAE or the religion on social media.
Illegal to wear any clothing that conceals the face in a public place.
Copyright on Little Mermaid Statue. Any photograph taken and used for commercial purposes will result in an invoice or fine.
Nudity is perimitted on some, but not all beaches.
Prostitution is legal, but only for residents. Pimping or operating a brothel are illegal.
Carrying a gun without a liscense is illegal.
Illegal to remove or extract natural resources such as gemstones or local plants.
Official permission is required for travel into the huge Northeast Greenland National Park or for treks across the central ice fields.
When driving a vehicle, cyclists have the right of way.
Whale meat is available in The Faroe Islands. But, importing it into Denmark proper is illegal
